page.title: 15A SANDY CUB PACK
page.content: I AM EIGHT YEARS OLD AND I AM IN THE SAXON'S CUB PACK, IT IS GREAT FUN. CUBS IS ON TUESDAY EVENINGS FROM SEVEN O'CLOCK UNTIL HALF PAST EIGHT. I AM IN GREY SIX. WE HAVE A SIXER WHO IS THE LEADER, AND A SECONDER. THE UNIFORM IS A CAP, SHORTS, BLACK SHOES, TRIANGULAR SCARF AND WOGGLE, LONG GREY SOCKS, GARTERS AND A JUMPER. WE HAVE TO WORK FOR BADGES. I HAVE TWO BADGES, THEY ARE ARTIST AND FIRST AID. LOTS OF THE BOYS IN MY CLASS GO TO CUBS BUT THEY BELONG TO DIFFERENT PACKS. I AM GOING TO JOIN THE GUIDE AND SCOUT BAND. IT IS THE BEST ACTIVITY THAT I DO AFTER SCHOOL.
